questions.question_text: What is the definition of a group?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D - Correct, a group is a collection of users. They don't have to be from the same department, team, etc. Duplicate question.
Duplicate of Q200

D is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/sandiego-platform-administration/page/administer/roles/concept/c_UserAdministration.html

questions.question_text: Which ServiceNow utility provides a modern interactive graphical interface to visualize configuration items and their relationships?

discussion.content: It is C for sure

Selected Answer: C
Dependency view is the correct answer.

Selected Answer: C
answer is C
C dependency view is the correct answer

Answer is C

C is the correct answer

The answer is C, Dependency View.
From ServiceNow documentation:
The maps generated by Dependency Views are based on D3 and Angular technology, providing a modern interactive graphical interface to visualize configuration items and their relationships.
